Package de.chojo.sqlutil.updater

Class SqlUpdater.SqlUpdaterBuilder<T extends JdbcConfig<?>>

java.lang.Object
de.chojo.sqlutil.updater.SqlUpdater.SqlUpdaterBuilder<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the jdbc link defined by the SqlType
Enclosing class:
SqlUpdater<T extends JdbcConfig<?>>
public static class SqlUpdater.SqlUpdaterBuilder<T extends JdbcConfig<?>> extends Object
Class to build a SqlUpdater with a builder pattern

      public SqlUpdater.SqlUpdaterBuilder<T> setVersionTable(String versionTable)
      The version table which contains major and patch version.

      Changing this later might cause a loss of data.

      Parameters:
      versionTable - name of the version table
      Returns:
      builder instance

    • execute

      public void execute() throws SQLException, IOException
      Build the updater and start the update process.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If execution of the scripts fails
      IOException - If the scripts can't be read.
